attributes.action: Make the Banks pay back the unfair bank charges so that the consumer can use their refunds to boost the failing economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to try and make the Government make the Banks pay us back the Money that they have taken from us.  Now that 'We' the tax payer part own the majority of the banks in this country is it not fair that we demand the repayment of these unfair charges.  Come on Mr Brown do something right before the next election.

rejection.details: Please remove reference to the election in your petition. As this is a civil service run website, petitions must be related to Mr Brown's role as Prime Minister rather than his role as leader of the Labour Party.
